content: after knitting up some shopping bags and being frustrated with certain features and getting feedback from the supermarket clerks who had to fill them with my groceries i finally decided that i had to design my own using those plastic bags we get at supermarkets in the us as my guide i ve created a bag that s * easy to knit out of any yarn * easy to fill with groceries * strong enough and stretchy enough to hold a lot * won t stretch and drag on the ground while you re carrying them while full the clerks at my market love these
